scripts.build: cd wealth-pioneers-network && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm exec vite build && pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.server.json
scripts.build:prod: cd wealth-pioneers-network && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm exec vite build && pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && echo 'Build completed successfully'
scripts.render:build: cd wealth-pioneers-network && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm exec vite build && pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.server.json
scripts.server:build: echo 'Server build already completed in build:prod'
